text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>

Success, it has been cross posted <https://discourse.julialang.org/t/56299| to Discourse>. Keep and eye out on Discourse for responses and please add an answer there once you are satisfied with the solution so others can benefit as well. Happy debugging!
Hmmm, interesting way to post stuff to discourse.

elements.text: Hmmm, interesting way to post stuff to discourse.

text: Hey <@UUT4VGTE2>, if you were able to find an answer here on Slack, please cross post it to Discourse via the link above. Thank you!
